## Sprint 1.1: Aspirant Foundation (Complete)

- [x] **T001** `test` Write aspirant registration tests (email verify, duplicate check) — FR-001
- [x] **T002** `feat` Aspirant registration endpoint (POST /api/auth/register) — FR-001
- [x] **T003** `feat` Email verification flow (token generation, verify endpoint) — FR-001
- [x] **T004** `feat` JWT auth middleware (authenticate, requireRole) — FR-002
- [x] **T005** `test` Write aspirant profile creation tests — FR-003
- [x] **T006** `feat` Aspirant profile CRUD (POST/GET/PUT /api/aspirants/profile) — FR-003
- [x] **T007** `feat` Profile completeness scoring (0-100 based on fields filled) — FR-003
- [x] **T008** `feat` Onboarding wizard UI (Next.js multi-step form) — FR-003

## Sprint 1.2: Assessment Engine (Complete)

- [x] **T010** `test` Write assessment schema tests (creation, question generation) — FR-004
- [x] **T011** `feat` Prisma schema: Assessment, AssessmentQuestion, AssessmentResult — FR-004, FR-005
- [x] **T012** `feat` Claude API integration for GRC question generation — FR-004
- [x] **T013** `feat` POST /api/assessments/start endpoint — FR-004
- [x] **T014** `feat` POST /api/assessments/:id/submit endpoint — FR-004
- [x] **T015** `feat` Competency scoring algorithm (weighted domain scoring) — FR-005
- [x] **T016** `feat` Gap analysis generation (incorrect answer analysis + study resources) — FR-005
- [x] **T017** `feat` Assessment UI (question flow, timer, result display) — FR-004, FR-005
- [x] **T018** `feat` Progress trend chart (competency over time) — FR-005
